advanced-features.title: Advanced Features
advanced-features.description: UC ORB Showcase includes powerful features designed to help researchers, students, and collaborators discover and explore UC open source projects effectively.

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: The UC ORB Showcase backend provides a comprehensive REST API built with FastAPI. All endpoints are read-only and provide access to repository data and filtering options.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Here are the best ways to get in touch with the UC ORB Showcase team and the UC Open Source Program Office (OSPO) network.

contributing.title: How to Contribute
contributing.description: Thank you for your interest in contributing to UC ORB Showcase! We welcome contributions from the UC community and beyond.

database-schema.title: Database Schema
database-schema.description: The UC ORB Showcase application uses PostgreSQL as its database backend. The schema is designed to store comprehensive repository metadata, funding information, and organizational details.

frontend-components.title: Frontend Components
frontend-components.description: The UC ORB Showcase frontend is built with React 19 and Next.js 15, using a component-based architecture with TypeScript for type safety. This guide covers the key components and their relationships.

intro.title: Overview
intro.description: Welcome to the UC ORB Showcase documentation! This guide provides a comprehensive overview of the application architecture, components, and how everything works together.

state-management.title: State Management
state-management.description: The UC ORB Showcase frontend uses a combination of Zustand for global state management and TanStack Query for server state management. This approach provides optimal performance and developer experience.
